layout:1`|layoutColor:white`|text1Size:26`|text1Font:Manteka`|text1Color:black`|text1Gravity:center_vertical`|text1:\"ONCE UPON A TIME, THERE WAS A GROUP OF STUDENTS WHO DECIDED TO SPEND A FEW NIGHTS IN A HOTEL.\n\nNOW THIS HOTEL DIDN\'T HAVE A GREAT REPUTATION, BUT IT WAS CHEAP, SO THE STUDENTS WERE LIKE \'EH… WE\'RE TIRED.\'\n\nWHEN THEY ARRIVED AT THE FRONT DESK, AN OLD MAN APPEARED AND SAID IN A HIGH SQUEAKY VOICE, \'HELLO. IT IS VERY NICE TO SEE YOU ALL THIS EVENING. SO FEW PEOPLE COME AROUND HERE. YOU WANT A ROOM YOU SAY? I HAVE THE PERFECT ONE. ROOM 1 RIGHT UP THESE STAIRS.\'\n\nEVEN THOUGH THE STUDENTS THOUGHT THE MAN WAS CREEPY, THEY WENT UP THE STAIRS ANYWAY FOR THEY WERE TIRED. WHEN THEY REACHED THE FIRST STEP OF THE STAIRWAY, THE OLD MAN YELLED, \'BEWARE OF THE CURSE!!!\'\n\nBUT REMEMBER, THESE ARE POOR, TIRED, AND SKEPTICAL STUDENTS… THEY WENT IN THE ROOM ANYWAY.\n\nWHEN THEY ENTERED THE ROOM, SOME OF THEM WERE CHANGED. THEY WERE NO LONGER THE SAME PEOPLE THEY ONCE WERE.\n\nA KILLER WAS AMONG THEM…\"

ROLES

PRO-TOWN ANTI-TOWN NEUTRAL
Citizens are the main inhabitants of the town. Unlike the other roles, citizens do not have any special powers. Their role, however, is not to be frowned upon for they have the opportunity to vote during the tribunal. During the tribunal, citizens typically make up the majority of voters. The doctor is the healer of the party. Every round, he has a chance to protect the citizens of his city. At night, the doctor indicates to the moderator one person whom he wants to protect. If the mafia chooses a victim and the victim is protected by the doctor, the victim will survive the night. Doctors are allowed to target themselves. The mafia is the villain in Mafia Rising. There can be a single mafia or multiple mafia in one game. In the beginning, the mafia will know who each other are, but they will have no information on any of the other roles. During the night phase, every mafia must agree on one person to try murdering. During the day phase, the mafia will be trying to deceive the non-mafia players by framing other players and drawing suspicion away from the actual mafia. To win, the mafia must murder enough non-mafia to become the majority. The moderator creates an immersive story for the players to play in. By interacting with various characters in the game, the moderator controls the game\'s progression. Also, the moderator may add sound effects to dramatize the game experience. The police\'s duty is to investigate the criminals of the town. At night, the police indicates to the moderator who he wants to suspect. If the police has correctly identified the mafia, the moderator will notify the police with a nod. If the police has not correctly identified the mafia, the moderator will notify the police with a shake of the head. During the day, the police will use the information gathered to sway public opinion to direct the public eye to the mafia without revealing himself in order to escape the murderous hand of the mafia.
